title: Ethereum Mining
about: WELCOME TO ETHEREUM MINING GROUP!!! ***PLEASE READ BEFORE PROCEEDING*** As we have grown over the past few months it has been brought to our attention that some rather disturbing posts have been made. Some were innocent and turned nasty, while others were made under pressure and spilled out inflammatory/derogatory language in general. We are all here to help and learn (and vice versa). While not everyone is perfect and a genius in this endeavor into the realms of this crypto market, we propose a few rules... Ethereum Mining Group 1. This group is about mining Ethereum: we're here to mine Ethereum. We're all about mining. No trader talk, price speculation, or how to write apps. Please post all of that in the main Ethereum group. Let's TALK about pools, video cards, rig components, mods, configuration files, photos and videos of your rigs. Let's AVOID telling people to just buy Eth and not mine, and talk about PoS unless you have real news. Wanna ask a technical question? Wanna know if your build is ok before buying something? This is the place. For simple questions please search this group, or use google, if you can’t find an answer then please ask. 2. If you want to sell something please use the "sell something" feature via the "More" tab at the top. Items being posted "For Sale" must have an actual photo of your item, a price and location, or it will be deleted/removed. Do not bash the items people are trying to sell, or say that they are overpriced and such, many sellers do it at a profit, and their expertise has added value. 3. Keep this group clean and mature. There's no need for the inflammatory swearing. Post clean constructive criticism, not drama instigating posts. While we all "get a hair" to blow off steam we should remain professional. Anyone posting derogatory/swearing/defaming posts/replies to posts will call for an automatic deleting of the post and warnings to be sent out. (This goes for all parties, poster and responders). 4. If a thread someone is posting is a newb question and you do not like it, just do not respond. Skip to the next thread. Someone here is willing to help answer newbs. Even though there may be a few newbs, we are still here to help one another. A professor once said, "The only stupid question is the one not asked". 5. If someone comments on your post and it's not a clear troll-like post, please do NOT say they are wasting your time. They took their own time to write something, so at least give them a POLITE comment. If you don't have anything nice to say in the group, you can leave the group. 6. Please do not post investment scams or links to scam sites, doing so will get you removed. Follow these few simple rules and let's keep Ethereum Mining a better place for all. Thanks for your time.

title: New Era TRON Cloud Mining
members_amount:
12
New Era currently has more than ten self-built mines and cooperative mines around the world, and strategically signed sources of supply to give priority to New Era. New Era creates a global clustered mine management concept, effectively diversifies user risks, and ensures the stable operation of the platform. Compared with other wealth management and fund products, Cloud Mining has the same fixed deposit cycle, lower subscription threshold and higher returns. As the world's leading one-stop blockchain computing power ecosystem, New Era North America Mining integrates more than 19 countries and regions around the world, has more than 800,000 mining machines, and supports ASIC. Various computing powers such as POSJPFS reduce the threshold for investors and the user has a high degree of choice. It can help miners reduce costs and protect mining revenue. In today's mining industry, globalization and specialization have become an irreversible wave. The Block Research data shows that in December 2020, Bitcoin miners' income reached nearly 700 million U.S. dollars, which is only the output value of one of the top ten currencies. The threshold for mining is getting higher and higher, and it is often difficult for ordinary users to complete the global mining and scale operations on their own. In the entire mining process, it is indeed difficult for small retail investors, especially Xiaobai, to make the right choice at each stage. Therefore, a service called "cloud mining" has emerged in recent years and has been rapidly promoted. The so-called "cloud mining" means that users purchase cloud computing power contracts through the platform, lease computing power for mining, and obtain income at regular intervals. Its core advantage is to simplify the process and lower the barriers to entry. Users do not need to purchase expensive mining machines, select mines, and do not need to perform 24-hour operation and maintenance by themselves. After the contract ends, there is no need to deal with machines, venues, etc., and withdrawal is more flexible.Investors can remotely monitor data and receive mining revenue. This method is very suitable for individual miners or new miners. The role of an individual miner is an investor, without the need to build a mining environment and perform operation and maintenance work. With the development of this industry, professional cloud mining such as New Era has won the trust of more and more customers.

title: Ravencoin Mining
about: WELCOME TO RAVENCOIN MINING GROUP!!! ***PLEASE READ BEFORE PROCEEDING*** 1. This group is about mining Ravencoin: we're here to mine Raven. We're all about mining. No trader talk, price speculation, or how to write apps. Please post all of that in the main Ravencoin group. Let's TALK about pools, video cards, rig components, mods, configuration files, photos and videos of your rigs. Let's AVOID telling people to just buy RVN and not mine. Wanna ask a technical question? Wanna know if your build is ok before buying something? This is the place. For simple questions please search this group, or use google, if you can’t find an answer then please ask. 2. If you want to sell something please use the "sell something" feature via the "More" tab at the top. Items being posted "For Sale" must have an actual photo of your item, a price and location, or it will be deleted/removed. Do not bash the items people are trying to sell, or say that they are overpriced and such, many sellers do it at a profit, and their expertise has added value. 3. Keep this group clean and mature. There's no need for the inflammatory swearing. Post clean constructive criticism, not drama instigating posts. While we all "get a hair" to blow off steam we should remain professional. Anyone posting derogatory/swearing/defaming posts/replies to posts will call for an automatic deleting of the post and warnings to be sent out. (This goes for all parties, poster and responders). 4. If a thread someone is posting is a newb question and you do not like it, just do not respond. Skip to the next thread. Someone here is willing to help answer newbs. Even though there may be a few newbs, we are still here to help one another. A professor once said, "The only stupid question is the one not asked". 5. If someone comments on your post and it's not a clear troll-like post, please do NOT say they are wasting your time. They took their own time to write something, so at least give them a POLITE comment. If you don't have anything nice to say in the group, you can leave the group. 6. Please do not post investment scams or links to scam sites, doing so will get you removed. Follow these few simple rules and let's keep Raven Mining a better place for all. Thx for "ethereum mining" group for the description, all the work is for them.

about: Este grupo tiene Cómo objetivo ofrecer contenido del mundo de las monedas cryptograficas 1. ¿Qué es Satoshi BTCs mining? Satoshi es una nueva aplicación asiática para el minado de una nueva criptomoneda (BTCs). Esta criptomoneda aún no ha sido lanzada al mercado pero como todas las demás está iniciando con la captación de nuevos usuarios, brindando la oportunidad de ir captando estas criptos mediante el minado. 2. ¿Cómo minar esta criptomoneda en la aplicación? Una vez registrado en la aplicación y activada la misma deberá iniciar el minado de esta criptomoneda. La misma minará un conjunto de bloques los cuales podrá reclamar una vez minado. El máximo de bloques minado es de 150 hasta el momento y una vez que llegue a este valor el minado se detendrá y deberá reclamarlos para poder continuar minando. Mínimo al día debe reclamar una vez para que no se detenga la acción de minar ya que los 150 bloques se llenan en 24 horas o menos. Puede reclamar a partir del primer bloque minado si lo desea. 3. ¿Qué ventajas presenta esta nueva aplicación? Esta nueva aplicación aparte del minar esta nueva criptomoneda te ofrece la oportunidad de captar otra criptomoneda, su similar Bitcoin (BTC). La app te oferta dos formas de generar ingresos mediante el btc, una mediante los bonos por registro y la otra mediante recompensas diarias a mineros seleccionados al azar entre los que hayan acertado en la letra de la suerte. 4. ¿Cómo obtener los bonos de registro? Los bonos de registros son fáciles de obtener. Solo por registrarte la aplicación te regalará diariamente fracciones de btc directos a tu cuenta de btc en la aplicación. Este bono durara de 5 a 7 días, dicho bono deberá reclamarlo diariamente. Pero esto no queda ahí, por cada referido te regalara fracciones de btc diariamente, es ahí una de las vías para ingresar ganancia rápidamente porque la aplicación permite hasta dos niveles de referidos. Esto también debe reclamarse diariamente. 5. ¿Cómo ganar BTC con las cartas de la suerte? Esta es la vía más rápida de obtener buenos ingresos en esta aplicación. Es tan sencillo como apostarle a una de las tres cartas o letra de la suerte (B, T, C) ¿Que se le apuesta? Para apostar a estas letras o cartas deberá obtener boletos los cuales se obtiene gracias a los referidos. La aplicación te da 100 boletos por cada referido. Estos boletos te lo activa después de los 7 días de registrado el referido. O sea, hoy logras atraer un referido y a la semana te dan diario 100 boletos para apostarlos. El número de boletos disponible de esta semana será = al número de mineros reclutados la semana pasada * 100. Los puedes apostar en una letra o distribuirlo en las tres para garantizar alguna ganancia. Las ganancias obtenidas varían en su valor. Puede ser 888 usd, 88 usd, 8 usd, 1 usd, 0.1 usd o 0.01 usd en btc. Cuantos más boletos tenga más posibilidades de ganar tendrá. Lo mejor de todo esto es que es gratis y sin ninguna inversión.

What is Full Velocity? FV is a technology company that offers a radical new way for the average person to take advantage of highly profitable crypto trading. FV has received exclusive license to Algorithmic Trading technology that has been actively trading since Feb 2021 with profits generated every single month. This same technology has been used during this time by many private users, high net worth individuals and private funds. And now you can take advantage of it too! During this time, the FV bot has averaged 2.4% gain per week, with a range of 0.4% to 5.1% in weekly gains. Of it's 48 weeks of life, it has only posted 4 losing weeks which means it has won 92% of the weeks since deployment. FV is NOT a financial services company and never collects or manages any capital. Your capital is safe on your own, separate trading accounts. What does FV Cost? ZERO Dollars! You don’t pay anything upfront for FV. You only pay a small weekly week based on the type of bot you deploy, and 30% of the profits the bot generates. If the bot doesn’t generate a profit for you, there are no Profit fees to pay! How do I deploy the FV bot? You can deploy the bot on your own trading/exchange account. FV supports multiple exchanges like bybit and binance, but is designed to best integrate with DART – a third-party DAO layer that connects to multiple exchanges, monitors the trades, and automatically settles the payments every week. FV is among the first companies to integrate with DART and this allows FV to easily collect the weekly 30% profit fees without any management or extra costs on your part. Dart also allows users to participate easily, including from US, as you can send in payments with Zelle, bank wire, or multiple cryptocurrencies like BTC and ETH. If you want to connect directly with a separate Binance or Bybit account, you can do so. But it requires additional integration and requires that you set aside some capital to pay for the regular profit fees. If you decide you are not happy with the trading the bot is doing on your account, you can simply disconnect it from your Dart, Binance or Bybit account by disabling it. How can I earn by sharing FV? FV offers a very generous and powerful affiliate program. Of the 30% profit fee generated every week, FV distributes up to 27% to its unilevel affiliate structure. There is no cost to join this program, and it is entire optional. You can share the FV program with others, use it for your own accounts, or do both – it is all in your control!
